columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the simulation.

columns.name: creation_time
columns.description: The time when the simulation was created, expressed as the number of seconds and milliseconds in UTC since the Unix epoch (0:0:0.000, January 1, 1970).

columns.name: status
columns.description: The current status of the simulation.

columns.name: execution_id
columns.description: A universally unique identifier (UUID) for this simulation.

columns.name: maximum_duration
columns.description: The maximum running time of the simulation, specified as a number of months (m or M), hours (h or H), or days (d or D).

columns.name: role_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Identity and Access Management (IAM) role that the simulation assumes to perform actions.

columns.name: schema_error
columns.description: An error message that SimSpace Weaver returns only if there is a problem with the simulation schema.

columns.name: live_simulation_state
columns.description: A collection of additional state information, such as domain and clock configuration.

columns.name: logging_configuration
columns.description: Settings that control how SimSpace Weaver handles your simulation log data.

columns.name: schema_s3_location
columns.description: The location of the simulation schema in Amazon Simple Storage Service (Amazon S3).

columns.name: target_status
columns.description: The desired status of the simulation.
